itadesign.beerdrinker

Class BeerConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • itadesign.beerdrinker.BeerConsumer

  • public abstract class BeerConsumer
extends java.lang.Object
    A typical beer consumer, who consumes beer in a public park.

    • Method Detail

      • shouldConsumeBeer

        protected abstract boolean shouldConsumeBeer(BeerBottle beerBottle)
        Generally a good decision on whether to consume another bottle of beer should be made here. A few general rules are nice to be followed:
        • Bottles larger than 0.5L in volume should be avoided
        • Bottles of beer stronger than 6% should be avoided
        • If blood alcohol content surpasses 120 milliliters drinking should stop
        Parameters:
        beerBottle - beer bottle being consumed
        Returns:
        true if beer should be consumed, false otherwise

      • showBeerBottleToAStranger

        public abstract BeerBottle showBeerBottleToAStranger(BeerBottle beerBottle,
                                                     boolean mightBeAPoliceMan)
        A stranger asks "What are you drinking?". What should you show? It is generally good to show a wrapped non-alcoholic beverage to a policemen. It is also wrong to lie to your friends.
        Parameters:
        beerBottle - beer bottle beer drinker is holder
        mightBeAPoliceMan - true if there is a high chance of a stranger being a policemen, false if it is drinkers friend
        Returns:
        Beer bottle shown to a stranger.

      • consumeBeer

        public final boolean consumeBeer(BeerBottle beerBottle)
        Beer drinker consumes a beer.
        Parameters:
        beerBottle -
        Returns:
        true if drinker consumed a beer

        Returns:
